MAIN_MESSAGE: This is a message for customers in the ML11 postcode area of Lanark. It is necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 9:00am to complete repairs on our overhead line network near Ravenstruther Rail and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 3:00pm. We will update this message if this information changes We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 8:32am on Tuesday, 17 November 2020
